headline: HONEYWELL COMPLETES SALE OF PERSONAL PROTECTIVE EQUIPMENT BUSINESS TO PROTECTIVE INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTS
summary: Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) today announced it has completed the sale of its Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) business to Protective Industrial Products, Inc. ("PIP") for $1.325 billion in an all-cash transaction. PIP is a global supplier and manufacturer of PPE products and a portfolio company of Odyssey Investment Partners.

headline: Honeywell to Buy Johnson Matthey’s Catalyst Unit For $2.4 Billion
summary: The U.S. industrials conglomerate agreed to buy Johnson Matthey’s catalysts unit, lifting shares in the British platinum refiner.

headline: HONEYWELL TO ACQUIRE JOHNSON MATTHEY'S CATALYST TECHNOLOGIES BUSINESS, EXPANDING PORTFOLIO OF LEADING CATALYST AND PROCESS TECHNOLOGIES
summary: Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) today announced that it has agreed to acquire Johnson Matthey's Catalyst Technologies business segment for £1.8 billion in an all-cash transaction, representing approximately 11x estimated 2025 EBITDA, inclusive of tax benefits and run-rate cost synergies. headline: Honeywell International Inc. (HON) Close to Acquiring Johnson Matthey Catalyst Unit
summary: Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) is close to securing a £1.8 billion ($2.4 billion) deal to acquire Johnson Matthey’s catalyst technologies division, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday. People familiar with the matter told the British newspaper that the business is expected to be combined with Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON)’s UOP brand, which builds technologies, including […]

headline: UK's Johnson Matthey sells unit to Honeywell for $2.4 billion
summary: British chemicals firm Johnson Matthey has agreed to sell a division that houses technologies that go into making sustainable fuels for 1.8 billion pounds , including debt to Honeywell International....
